item.description:
LET's CELEBRATE!

1 Year and having the Best Time Ever!

Come by anytime for treats & live music and plenty of surprises!

The Cafe has been a place to eat clean organic food

The Cafe has been a place to learn how to make raw food

Tha Cafe has been a place to hear from the leaders in the field

The Cafe has offered so many people a safe place to hang and meet others

The Cafe has been a place to drink Smoothies or Organic Tea

LET's CELEBRATE 1 Year and bring on a JOYOUS year 2!

Raffles
Live Music...

This is a reminder e-mail.

Being from West Haven, I am aware of the parking
Problems on Campbell Avenue.
I am also aware of parking areas
That others might not be aware of or use.
Most of the time, I use the large parking area that is behind
Glen’s Cafe.

On Campbell Avenue, turn into the side street
Of Curtis Place next to
Marc Anthony’s Pizza Italian Restaurant
There is a large parking area behind there.
Going to Campbell Avenue, you can walk over towards
Marc Anthony’s.
Then turn right on Campbell Avenue to Glen’s Cafe.

I walk over toward the right from the parking lot.
There is an alley between the buildings.
On Campbell Avenue, I turn left.
Glen’s Cafe is a few stores in.

http://www.catchaheal...

www.catchahealthyhabit.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Glen is POC & running this event. I will be in the Cafe.
item.name: Coffee Talk attends Raw Food 1 Year Anniversary Blowout!
